Class Tester

java.lang.Object
users.User
users.Tester
All Implemented Interfaces:
Searchable, Sortable
Direct Known Subclasses:
JuniorDeveloper
public class Tester extends User implements Searchable, Sortable
Represents a Tester user with permissions to view, search, and sort contacts.
